storyInfo:
Siege receives intelligence on the Duke of Caster from Trilby Asher, which helps the Rhodes Islanders understand the battlefield and devise their battle plans.
The Exemplars and Rhodes Island join forces to stop the Military Commission from bringing the complete descent of Amnannam.

attributes.content: Three hours later...
No sign of the Sarkaz troops.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Lifebone is a big target, and we would have left an even bigger trail behind us as we fell. I'm afraid that they'll catch up to us sooner or later.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Closure, can you confirm our position?
attributes.name: Siege
Closure
attributes.content: I can only really get an approximate orientation with these maps I've got on hand...

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: Dammit, still no response.
attributes.joined: I can only really get an approximate orientation with these maps I've got on hand... Dammit, still no response.

attributes.content: Ever since the skeleton crashed, all our comms went down with it. My drones can't fly too far either, I've never seen this much interference before.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, I think a drone just found something...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Over there!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What's this? A voice recorder?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Makes sense, I guess. On a battlefield like this, this is the next best way to relay intel, short of just shouting.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That's the Duke of Caster's crest.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Lemme have a look—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: 'I'm short on time, so I'll make it brief.'
'But the Sarkaz and their tricks are worse than we thought here at the frontline.'
'My advice is head to the battle from the southwest, bring the sword—'
'Bzz—I have honored my vow, so the rest is up to Your Highness—'

attributes.content: No change, no improvement.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Can tell your new pal that if it doesn't get back on its ass soon, I'm going to break whatever bones it's got left, one by one?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's long dead. Not like it can feel pain. Why not pick something more meaningful to vent about?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The skeleton's voice was already ebbing. After the crash, it had stopped responding altogether.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The nerve bundles are withering. We've tried everything we can think of. Lubricant, supplements, even some crazy witchcraft I've never heard of before. My verdict is...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Right now, it's nothing more than a colossal and breakable skeleton.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It can't be dead dead, can it? I mean, it's already a dead Feranmut, you're telling me it can die again?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey Ines, pass me the mine over there, the one wedged between the bones.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Glad you asked, nearly stepped on it.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And also, what kind of psychotic idea do you have this time?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh, just following your suggestion. I'm gonna go find a proper target to blow up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Isn't that old friend of yours supposed to be the skeleton whisperer or something? I'm sure she's still got an unbroken rib or two, so she should be able to talk. Maybe. Well, she will if she knows what's good for her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ulšulah. She does know plenty of the Feranmut's secrets, and it's clear she hasn't told us everything.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But I have the feeling that she won't be able to help with this particular problem.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The source of our troubles is what's hidden in those dark red clouds above our heads.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That's exactly it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, the all-knowing Kal'tsit. Let me guess, you've got even more bad news for us?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Regular Catastrophes have no effect on Feranmuts, even if it happens to be one that has been dead for several centuries. The tunnels that it travels in can even drill through time, so how is it that a storm can seal them off?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What's happening here is beyond the scope of a mere Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As we were falling, I had a vague feeling.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That the enormous, ancient sentience remaining in these bones... had gone. Gone somewhere I could not touch.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It died its true death?;It's free now?

attributes.content: Our connection with it has been severed.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It might only be temporary, but if we take too long, we might lose control over it for good.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Your deduction is correct. Upon his inspection, Logos confirmed that the Sarkaz witchcraft cast upon this skeleton is being disrupted by a massive source of energy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems the Vampire's ritual was completed. The Confessarius... Qui'sartuštaj is aiding Theresis, and has achieved what the Sarkaz could not for millennia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Ancient Sarkaz language) 'Amnannam'. An ancient wound that refuses to heal, the Cunabula of Suffering.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mind skipping to the part we can actually understand? I don't have all day.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It was the first curse, just as it was the first Originium.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Isn't that just a legend? You know, the made-up kind in the storybooks that Hoederer loves to read.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Legends are a shadow of reality, despite all the untruths and half-lies painted over them. To say nothing of the fact that this is a Sarkaz legend. A Teekaz legend.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sounds to me like Theresis is cooking up some real serious beastshit to hang over Victoria.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I fear that this, too, is the reason he chose Londinium as his base of operations. The Shard's ability to influence Catastrophes and Originium is already sufficient for it to become Amnannam's beacon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Across all of Terra, as it is now, this is the one place that it can descend.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, out with it then, how do we wreck the thing?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: At Terra's current level of technology, there is nothing we can do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The only good news is that it has not yet fully descended.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Have you figured something out, Logos?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The drop of blood that the Vampire possesses, the one he calls the Blood of Teekaz... It is still fulfilling its duty.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The reason why Amnannam is able to leap across millennia and descend once more is because of his prayer.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The blood's master has fallen, but the connecting veins hold steady.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: If we are to prevent the reemergence of Amnannam on this land, we must break the Vampire's curse, quelling the hatred that resides in this drop of blood.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I think... I can give it a try.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was blighted in battle with the Vampire, and its influence on me has not yet waned. By virtue of this, I am able to sense where the Blood of Teekaz is.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It is at the rear of the Nachzehrer army.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It will likely be protected in a Confessarius altar and heavily guarded. The amount of time required to break through the entire Nachzehrer defensive line would be too much.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: We could cross the Redmane Mountains, bypassing most of the warzone.

attributes.content: Taking that route carries a similar risk to storming the battlefield.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our observational reports indicate that the Redmane Mountains have been completely transformed by Amnannam's influence. They are now blanketed in active Originium. I need not remind you of its extreme danger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But... it might be possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shining has gone ahead to seek out Qui'sartuštaj, and if things go well for her, she will be able to come to our aid.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I support the Doctor's decision. It's the plan that saves us the most time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we keep delaying until the Amnannam Dr. Kal'tsit speaks of completes its descent, and is used by Theresis as a weapon...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then we will have lost any chance we might have had to turn the tide.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if there are risks, we must forge ahead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll need your help, W.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You need some hands to guard this pile of bones, right, bunny?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This skeleton is crucial to our next operation. Besides, Hoederer needs it too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no doubt that the Military Commission has been watching us ever since we crashed.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The way I see it, it makes no sense to hand back something we fought so hard to steal in the first place.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Give me a time frame. The time now is... 18: 00.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Three days.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The surrounding terrain has been completely transformed. We will need to pass through a wasteland filled with unknown dangers.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Given also the fact that battles with be inevitable in our journey, I estimate at least three days to handle the Blood of Teekaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: An immobile skeleton makes for an extremely conspicuous objective. Guarding this site will not necessarily be easier than the raid you carried out on it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I propose that Ascalon stay behind and help protect the Lifebone.

attributes.content: But my job is to stay by your side and keep you safe, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: During the Sanguinarch's attack, it was my error that led to your injury, a dangerous mistake I do not intend on repeating.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: The Lifebone is vital, and Manfred is likely to order an assault.

attributes.content: I agree. The Sarkaz will be reliant on their commander personally overseeing the battle and making decisions. If you are able to stem Manfred's advance, then that might relieve pressure on the mercenaries.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will respect your decision.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: What about the gang of useless Victorians? Are they going with you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We will head to the front lines at Silverrock Bluffs.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait, are you saying you want to lead just a couple thousand men, some of whom are civilians who've barely held a weapon, straight into battle with the Nachzehrer army?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You have your legends, Sarkaz, and we have ours.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We have the Sighs of Kings, the blade that can cleave Catastrophe in twain.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Since the Sarkaz have controlled the storm, then it's time that this sword plays its part.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You have been contacted by the Duke of Caster.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: An invitation to be precise.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It is as we surmised. Since the Sarkaz started their strange... doings, the Victorians, or rather, the ducal alliance have been heavily hit.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Caster, no, any Grand Duke ought to have figured out exactly the kind of circumstances Victoria has found herself in.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've all seen those altars spewing that red light, or any light for that matter. As it stands, Londinium and all the battlefields surrounding it have become a giant Arts Circle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is how the Sarkaz fight. Not like Leithanien. Not like Ursus. Not like any other nation's tactics that we are familiar with.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Trilby Ashers will have told Caster that all the intelligence they have gathered so far is useless when it comes to Sarkaz tactics.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Sighs of Kings... No longer will this piece of steel I hold in my hand be merely a leverage to get Caster back to the negotiation table. It will turn the tide of war, bringing true change to the battlefield.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: None of us knows when the next Catastrophe will strike.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't know what form Caster's 'Stone of the Sword' will take, but no matter if it's a square room on wheels or an odd contraption on an officer's back, I'll find it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If we can quiet these storms, then I dare say that the battle will become somewhat more evenly matched.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: From Sufrior Chasm to the front line at Silverrock Bluffs... It will take you two days, even if you follow the road that the dukes have cleared from the Westbound Forest to Gibsonham.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Duke of Caster would be more than happy to snatch away the Sighs of Kings, if afforded the opportunity. It will allow her to lead the dukes in this difficult war, and move her one step closer to the throne.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And she will not be the only one attempting to do so.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am aware.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Duke of Windermere has died in combat, and her troops have retreated from battle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If any other duke withdraws their forces, the scales of war will be tipped even more against us. The war will drag on, Londinium's restoration will be delayed, and more blood will be shed.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: For Sarkaz and Victorian alike, this is the battle that will determine our ultimate fate.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And as for us... We are the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wherever a miracle is needed the most, is where we will be.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Besides, if this sword really can calm storms as the legends say, I daresay it would help speed along your journey to Londinium, after all this.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Closure?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How'd you know I was done with my preparations?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: To keep things short, your ever-reliable Chief Engineer Closure and her team have come up with seven different plans to get around the comms interference.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This equipment of mine has also started analyzing that super-Catastrophe's trends and impacts.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Originium triggered reactions always leave a trail, no matter how intense they are... things like dust concentration, activity index, and then there's spread conditions—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Well, I'm sorry to say that all these metrics are pretty high, as expected, so we can't tell what's going to happen in the most dangerous regions.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But we can deduce which parts of the battlefield are safer. Relatively.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That is, of course, if we can go deeper into the heart of this battle and obtain more data.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Misery's agreed to be our bodyguard, but since you guys are already heading over to where there's most action going on, I figured we might as well tag along.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So... could we trouble the Exemplars to look after us?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Gladly, we are duty-bound.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Making sure that things don't get any worse is Rhodes Island's mission, right, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Thank you, Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Let's both go with Amiya.;Could I go with Siege and Closure?;I'd prefer to stay here with the skeleton.

attributes.content: Our path might be the most dangerous one of all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I'll keep you safe, Doctor... Just like always.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you for trusting in us, Doctor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your command experience will be most valuable.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're serious?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You do realize that with the bunny and the crone's pet gone, I can pretty much do whatever I want, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know you fear for the safety of each and every operator, which makes you hesitant to choose.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the truth is that I need you to come with me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: So we can go behind enemy lines together?;So we can deal with the altar problem?

attributes.content: There is no changing what we will face during our final confrontation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Originium has shaped the history of the Sarkaz, just as it will shape the futures of us all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps you still have misgivings about why Rhodes Island must intervene in this war. I did not have the opportunity to explain in the past, and nor could I give you a precise answer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have never doubted that the dark clouds above the Shard concealed some dreadful unknown. Yet when it has revealed itself, as it has now, I still find myself confronted by... mixed emotions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm not one to explore the subject of fate, especially not yours and mine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But now, fate has reared its head, and is coming our way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Kal'tsit...;You don't sound like your usual self.

attributes.content: Originium's effects are far beyond any of our comprehension.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... I hope...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, I believe...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I believe that you are still the one who can change everything.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've never had any doubts, either.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I think should get going now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not gonna ask me for a twenty-one-gun salute?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Take care, W.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Look, little bunny, I'm not like the sheep over there. I'm real hard to kill.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The Exemplars are ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Glad to hear it, Siege.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Remember everyone, time is of the essence.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Every minute, every second on this battlefield... There will be people who are suffering because of Originium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Our mission is clearer than ever.
Stop the spreading of Originium.;Stop Amnannam.

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And then, we plunge into the darkest depths of the fog.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We'll bomb that tower and grab Terra's biggest bastard out of the rubble.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We'll stop the disaster before us, and any more yet to come.
attributes.name: Amiya
